# uberspace_mailuser (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uberspace_maildomain" "mail" {
  asteroid = "isabell"
  name     = "mail.isabell.uber.space"
}

resource "uberspace_mailuser" "isabell" {
  // a mail user usually depends on a mail domain
  depends_on = [uberspace_maildomain.mail]

  name            = "isabell"
  password_hash   = "xxx"
  asteroid_name   = "isabell"
  maildomain_name = uberspace_maildomain.mail.name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Local part of the mail address, e.g. 'isabell' for 'isabell@example.org'.

### Optional

- `asteroid_name` (String)
- `format` (String)
- `is_catchall` (Boolean) whether this mail user should receive all mails to the domain.
- `is_sysmail` (Boolean) whether this mail user should receive mails to name@uber.space.
- `keep_forwards` (Boolean) If the mails should stay in the mailbox after forwarding (true), or be deleted (false).
- `local` (String)
- `maildomain_name` (String)
- `password_hash` (String) Mutually exclusive with alias. Either must be given.

### Read-Only

- `asteroid` (String)
- `created_at` (String)
- `forwards` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--forwards))
- `mailaddr` (String)
- `pk` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--forwards"></a>
### Nested Schema for `forwards`

Read-Only:

- `destination` (String) Mail address to forward to, e.g. 'isabell@example.org'.
- `keep` (Boolean)
